column1: Little Goat Diner////Then came my sammich
column2: Los Drowned. I have to admit
column3: that i do not remember what my gf ordered. Mainly because this sammich consumed all my attention. Upon first bite
column5: then stopped. Cardiac Arrest. I could have died there a happy man. Fortunately
column6: i got to enjoy a few more bites before my belt told me that there was no more room.
